title: Ownership and personal use of tablet computers 2012 , by country
summary: This bar chart has 8 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Percentage of population in each Country on the y axis.
The Percentage of population is appeared to be the highest at Country Spain and lowest at Country Germany.
The lowest value at Country Germany is 2.4x times less than the highest value at Spain.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Percentage of population in the y axis.
The Percentage of population is appeared to be the highest at Country Spain and lowest at Country Germany.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 8 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Percentage of population in each Country on the y axis.
The Percentage of population is appeared to be the highest at Country Spain and lowest at Country Germany.
The lowest value at Country Germany is 2.4x times less than the highest value at Spain.
max_summary: This bar chart has 8 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Percentage of population in each Country on the y axis.
The Percentage of population is highest at Country Spain and lowest at Country Germany.
Second maximum Percentage of population is found at Country Australia.
The minimum Country Germany has got 2.4 times less Percentage of population than the maximum Country Spain.
Country Spain is higher than any other Countrys with value 24.0, followed by Australia, and Italy. Down to Country Germany with the lowest value 10.0.
Country Spain, and Australia share the same value 24.0.
The highest value 24.0 at Spain is almost 1.31 times larger than the average value 18.38.
